citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A written program of veterinary care addressing veterinary care for all the animals was not available for review at the time
of inspection. A written program of veterinary care is needed to establish an adequate standard of care for the animals on
hand. Each dealer shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements, and in the case of a part-time
attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary
care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises.
Correct by December 19, 2025,
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A written program of veterinary care addressing veterinary care for all the animals was not available for review at the time 
of inspection. A written program of veterinary care is needed to establish an adequate standard of care for the animals on 
hand. Each dealer shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements, and in the case of a part-time 
attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary 
care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises. 
 
Correct by December 19, 2025, 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
